auth.termsAgreement: By signing in, you agree to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy

validation.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 8 characters
validation.passwordHint: Use 8+ characters with a mix of letters, numbers & symbols

changePassword.title: Change Password
changePassword.securityMessage: You must change your password before continuing. This is a one-time requirement for security purposes.
changePassword.success: Password changed successfully! Please login with your new password.

twoFactor.title: Two-factor authentication
twoFactor.enterCode: Enter the code from your authenticator app
twoFactor.step1Desc: Scan this QR code with your authenticator app (Google Authenticator, Authy, etc.)
twoFactor.manualEntry: Enter this code manually in your authenticator app:
twoFactor.step2Desc: Enter the 6-digit code from your authenticator app
twoFactor.backupCodesDesc: Save these backup codes in a safe place. Each code can only be used once.
twoFactor.setupFailed: Failed to set up 2FA. Please try again.
twoFactor.invalidCode: Invalid verification code. Please try again.
twoFactor.invalidBackupCode: Invalid backup code. Please try again.
twoFactor.enabledDesc: Your account is now protected with two-factor authentication
twoFactor.skipDevRedirect: Redirecting to chat... You can disable this in Security Settings.
twoFactor.skipDevNote: (Development only - will not work in production)

accountRequest.title: Request Account Access
accountRequest.description: Please fill out the form below to request access to AfricAI Digital Books. Our team will review your request and get back to you within 1-2 business days.
accountRequest.howDidYouHear: How did you hear about us?
accountRequest.whyUse: Why do you want to use AfricAI Digital Books?
accountRequest.whyUsePlaceholder: Tell us about your team, your needs, and how you plan to use AfricAI Digital Books...

success.title: Request Submitted!
success.message: Thank you for your interest in AfricAI Digital Books. We have received your account request and will review it within 1-2 business days.
success.emailNote: You will receive an email at once your request has been processed.

home.title: AfricAI Digital Books
home.tagline: Smart business management powered by AI

expenseTracking.title: Expense Tracking
expenseTracking.desc: Scan receipts with AI to automatically extract and categorize expenses. No manual data entry.

timeManagement.title: Time & Project Management
timeManagement.desc: Track billable hours, manage projects, and generate invoices with intelligent automation.

accounting.title: Accounting
accounting.desc: Manage invoices, track payments, and keep your books organized with simple financial tools.

aiInsights.title: AI-Powered Insights
aiInsights.desc: Chat with AI to query your business data, generate reports, and get actionable insights.

freeForSmall.title: Always Free for Small Teams
freeForSmall.note: No credit card required. No hidden fees. Just free time tracking and accounting for small teams, forever.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.desc1: AfricAI Digital Books is built on a simple principle: great tools should be accessible to everyone.
mission.desc2: All revenue from larger companies is reinvested directly into development, hosting, maintenance, and improvements. Our goal is to end each year at a $0 balance, ensuring every dollar goes back into making AfricAI Digital Books better for everyone.
mission.desc3: No investors. No exit strategy. Just sustainable software for the long term.

sponsor.title: Sponsor
sponsor.desc: Financial support to keep the lights on and features coming. Your logo on our website and eternal gratitude.

angel.title: Angel Supporter
angel.desc: One-time or recurring donations to support development. Every contribution helps us stay independent.

volunteer.title: Volunteer
volunteer.desc: Contribute code, design, documentation, or feedback. Help us build something amazing together.

cta.title: Ready to streamline your business?
cta.desc: Join businesses using AI to manage expenses, track time, and gain insights.

home.footer: © 2025 AfricAI Digital Books. Built with ❤️ for small teams everywhere.

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.customizationHint: Drag cards to reorder, click X to remove, or add new KPIs
dashboard.allKpisAdded: All available KPIs are already added

timeEntries.title: Time Entries
timeEntries.trackDesc: Track and manage your time across projects
timeEntries.teamDesc: View and manage time entries for your team
timeEntries.allTenantsDesc: Manage time entries across all tenants
timeEntries.selectTenantToView: Select a tenant to view time entries
timeEntries.selectTenantHint: Please select a tenant from the dropdown above to view and manage time entries.
timeEntries.noEntriesHint: Start tracking time by creating your first time entry or use the chat to log time naturally.
timeEntries.errorStopping: An error occurred while stopping the timer
timeEntries.errorLoading: An error occurred while loading time entries

projects.title: Projects
projects.searchPlaceholder: Search by name, description, or client...
projects.billableHint: Check if this project should be billed to the client
projects.fixedHoursHint: Set a fixed number of allocated hours for this project
projects.allocatedHoursHint: Original contracted hours (can add more later if scope changes)
projects.addHoursPrompt: How many additional hours do you want to add to the budget?
projects.addHoursFeature: Feature coming soon: Add hours via API

clients.title: Clients
clients.confirmDeactivate: Are you sure you want to deactivate {clientName}? This action cannot be undone.
clients.prefixHint: Leave empty to use tenant default

invoices.title: Invoices
invoices.description: Create and manage invoices with line items
invoices.noInvoices: No invoices found. Create one to get started.
invoices.addLineItem: Please add at least one line item

generate.title: Generate Invoices

generate.noBillableEntries: No billable time entries found for the selected criteria.
generate.adjustCriteria: Try adjusting the date range or project selection.

users.title: Users
users.name: Name
users.autoPasswordHint: A secure password will be automatically generated. The user will be required to change it on first login.
users.tempPasswordFor: A temporary password has been generated for {email}
users.passwordOnce: This password will only be shown once. The user will be required to change it on first login.
users.deactivateWarning: This will deactivate the user account. The user will no longer be able to log in.
users.confirmEmail: Warning: To confirm, please type the user's email address: {email}
users.confirmImpersonate: Are you sure you want to impersonate {email}? You will be logged in as this user.
users.errorImpersonate: An error occurred while trying to impersonate the user.
users.errorDeactivate: An error occurred while deactivating the user.
users.emailMismatch: Email does not match. Please enter the exact email address to confirm deletion.
users.errorCreate: An error occurred while creating the user.

profile.title: Profile Settings
profile.description: Manage your communication preferences and notifications
profile.communicationDesc: Choose your preferred method for receiving communications from the platform
profile.frequencyDesc: Control how often you receive notifications about user activity

frequencies.immediateDesc: Receive notifications as soon as events occur
frequencies.hourlyDesc: Receive a summary of notifications once per hour
frequencies.dailyDesc: Receive a daily summary of all notifications
frequencies.weeklyDesc: Receive a weekly summary of all notifications

profile.recoveryDesc: Add a secondary email address to help you recover your account if needed
profile.primaryEmailHint: Your primary email cannot be changed here
profile.secondaryEmailHint: We'll send a verification email to this address
profile.saveError: An error occurred while saving settings

security.title: Security Settings
security.description: Manage your password and security preferences
security.changePasswordDesc: Choose a strong password to keep your account secure
security.newPasswordHint: Must be at least 8 characters long
security.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 8 characters long
security.errorPassword: An error occurred while changing password
security.twoFactorDesc: Add an extra layer of security to your account
security.twoFactorExplain: Two-factor authentication (2FA) adds an additional layer of security to your account by requiring a verification code from your phone in addition to your password.
security.enable2faPassword: For security, please enter your current password to enable 2FA
security.scanQr: Step 1: Scan this QR code with your authenticator app
security.enterCode: Step 2: Enter the 6-digit verification code from your app
security.currentlyEnabled: Two-factor authentication is currently enabled. You'll be prompted for a verification code when you sign in.
security.confirmDisable: Are you sure you want to disable Two-Factor Authentication?
security.skipDevModeDesc: When enabled, you won't be prompted for a 2FA code during login in development. This is for convenience during local development only and will not work in production.
security.devOnlyNote: Development Only: This setting is only available in development mode and will have no effect in production environments.

tips.uniquePassword: Use a unique password that you don't use for other accounts
tips.enable2fa: Enable two-factor authentication for additional security
tips.neverShare: Never share your password or 2FA codes with anyone
tips.passwordManager: Use a password manager to generate and store strong passwords

chat.startConversation: Start a conversation by typing a message below. I can help you track time, query your hours, and manage your projects using natural language.

examples.timeToday: How much time did I log today?
examples.weeklyHours: Show my hours for this week
examples.clientMeeting: I worked 3.5 hours yesterday on the client meeting

chat.failedToSend: Failed to send message. Please try again.
chat.startNewToGetStarted: Start a new conversation to get started

landing.title: AfricAI Digital Books
landing.tagline: Ovitjivero vyomurumendu vyomwa kapara na AI

expenseTracking.title: Ovikonekero vyomali
expenseTracking.description: Tara ovikara na AI mwa kutja i ture ovikonekero vyomali ni kuvihinda. Kotji wi koneke na matjoko.

timeManagement.title: Ovikonekero vyorunyime na projekta
timeManagement.description: Koneka oviiri vyomurumendu, sanda projekta, ni kutjanga invoice na automation yomwa.

accounting.title: Okuvereka omali
accounting.description: Sanda invoice, koneka payment, ni kuzera omavatjo gomali gomwa na ovitjangwa vyorupe.

aiInsights.title: Ovikanongi vya AI
aiInsights.description: Tjivera na AI mwa kutja u pura ovikanongi vyomurumendu womwa, tjanga ovireport, ni kuwana ovikanongi.

freeTier.title: Mbyoka koripehi komaunyuni momatiti
freeTier.criteria1: ✓ Ovikambero vina vantu vetano vamwe ovitivi
freeTier.criteria2: ✓ Omali yovakurire kutja $25,000 mo ngunda imwe
freeTier.description: Kotji u purwa card yomali. Kotji fees tjomutavera. Koripehi komaunyuni momatiti, runyime ronene.

mission.title: Oviyambiro vyetu
mission.paragraph1: AfricAI Digital Books i tjangwa mo principle yomwa yorupe:
mission.principle: ovitjangwa vyomwa vi yambire vazehe venne
mission.paragraph2: Omali yonne yomwa ku kambero yeya i verwa mo development, hosting, maintenance, na improvement. Oviyambiro vyetu ke mwa kutja tu zuvise ngunda yimwe na
mission.paragraph2End: ku zera kutja dollar yimwe ni yimwe i etja mo AfricAI Digital Books mwa kutja i ve nawa ko vazehe venne.
mission.paragraph3: Kotji nao vanduruki. Kotji exit strategy. Koripehi software yomwa ko runyime rorotendi.

sponsor.title: Mutwarisi
sponsor.description: Otuware womali mwa kutja ovo lights vi tjike na feature. Logo yomwa mo website yetu ni kuvihumbatira ko runyime ronene.

angel.title: Mutwarisi Angel
angel.description: Donation imwe mbyoka ndo kare ko runyime mwa kutja u tuware development. Otunene tondawa yimwe ni yimwe i tuware.

volunteer.title: Volunteer
volunteer.description: Ture code, design, documentation, mbyoka feedback. Tuware mwa kutja tu tjange oviwa tjinene kombanda.

cta.title: Wa zigere mwa kutja u tjange omurumendu womwa?
cta.description: Tjingira mo vakambero vina AI mwa kutja va sande omali, koneka runyime, ni kuwana ovikanongi.

footer.copyright: © 2025 AfricAI Digital Books. Tjangwa na ❤️ ko maunyuni momatiti ko muzemo wenne.
